newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia in low inflation period - Costello.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia in low inflation period - Costello.

text.p: Treasurer Peter Costello said on Wednesday inflation figures released earlier showed Australia was decisively in a low inflation period.
Costello also told reporters that lower inflation was the right climate for lower interest rates.

The consumer price index (CPI) rose 0.2 percent in the December quarter, the lowest quarterly change since the December quarter 1993, for an annual CPI rise of 1.5 percent, the lowest since the March quarter of 1994, official data showed.
